alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 01 at 1:45PM PST until January 02 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures are expected to drop to 31 to 35 degrees late tonight and Sunday morning in the valleys, and as low as 28 degrees in the lower deserts. * WHERE...Inland Empire, San Diego County Valleys and Deserts. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Frost is likely again on Sunday night.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys
